faqs.question: What industries do you serve?
faqs.answer: We serve a wide range of industries including eCommerce, retail, technology, healthcare, manufacturing, finance, and more. Our diverse expertise allows us to adapt our solutions to virtually any sector.

faqs.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A typical web development project takes 6-12 weeks, while eCommerce management is an ongoing service. We provide detailed timelines during the discovery phase.

faqs.question: Do you offer ongoing support and maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive support and maintenance packages for all our services. This includes 24/7 monitoring, regular updates, security patches, and dedicated support channels.

faqs.question: What makes MettGlobal different from competitors?
faqs.answer: Our holistic approach combines technical excellence with business strategy. We don't just deliver solutionsâ€”we deliver results. Our team's diverse expertise, proven track record, and commitment to innovation set us apart.

faqs.question: Can you work with our existing team and tools?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We're experienced in collaborating with in-house teams and integrating with existing tools and workflows. We adapt to your processes while bringing best practices and optimization.

faqs.question: What is your pricing model?
faqs.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including project-based, retainer, and performance-based options. Each engagement is customized to your budget and objectives. Contact us for a detailed quote tailored to your needs.

faqs.question: Do you sign NDAs and protect confidential information?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take confidentiality very seriously. We're happy to sign NDAs and have strict internal protocols to protect all client data and intellectual property.

faqs.question: How do you ensure quality and meet deadlines?
faqs.answer: We use agile methodologies, rigorous QA processes, and project management best practices. You'll have a dedicated project manager, regular status updates, and clear milestone tracking throughout.
